short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance reading with FocusRead! Spotlight and readability modes provided. Also, quickly lookup word meaning with double-click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your reading experience with FocusRead! Toggle spotlight mode to highlight text under your mouse, dimming the entire page with a customizable radius. Use readability mode to strip away ads for a clean view, and adjust font size. Effortlessly get word meanings with a double-click. Customizable and user-friendly, FocusRead helps you read with focus and minimal distraction.
